name: Drying tomatoes
description:
Your village is on the verge of starvation. The land is drying and soon nothing will grow... In short it's not your best summer.

Grow 100 tomatoes 🍅 close to the water and bring them back to the village so that you can migrate to a more welcoming land.

Every 10 seconds the water goes further away

  1. Plant and grow tomatoes 🍅
  2. Go back to your people to convert tomatoes 🍅 to seeds. 🌱
  3. Plant more tomatoes 🍅

🎮 Arrow keys to move, space to plant a seed

❗ Tomatoes will not grow on dry land (1) they must be planted on land close enough to the water (2)

❗ Go back to your people to convert tomatoes 🍅 to seeds. 🌱 (3)
